name: Night in the Woods

files.game: N/A:Select the Linux installer downloaded from GOG

execute.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Linux installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: Game/start.sh
installer:
- execute:
    args: $game -d "$GAMEDIR" "data/noarch/*"
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
    file: unzip
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Game
    src: $GAMEDIR/data/noarch
